channel.title: Help?!
channel.description:
I have Hamachi, I log in to the thing with the correct Network Name, and Password
Open MoparScape as usual, go to File -> New Server -> [SERVER IP] -> Ok
Then, File -> New Port -> [PORT NUMBER]
Try to log in, but it won't let me. :O
I have tried this with numerous servers, so I doubt it is because the server is Offline.
*NOTE: I have never logged into MoparScape on somebody elses server.

item.title: Help?!
item.dc:creator: @slomifier slomifier
item.description:
@slomifier wrote:

Don’t use hamachi. It’s messy. It’s stupid. And isen’t compatable with some routers.
Use No-Ip, Join the light side.

Read full topic
